scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run build:scripts -s && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:markup -s && npm run build:doc
scripts.build-verbose: npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles && npm run build:markup
scripts.build:scripts: browserify -d client/js/app.js -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map main.js.map --output dist/main.js.map] | hashmark -n dist/main.js -s -l 8 -m assets.json 'dist/{name}.{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:styles: stylus -u autoprefixer-stylus client/css/main.styl --include-css --compress -m -o dist/main.css && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main.css 'dist/{name}.{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:styles-compressed: stylus -u autoprefixer-stylus client/css/main.styl --include-css --compress -m -o dist/main.css && cssmin dist/main.css > dist/main.min.css && hashmark -s -l 8 -m assets.json dist/main.min.css 'dist/{name}.{hash}{ext}'
scripts.-build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: npm run open:dev -s && parallelshell "npm run live-reload -s" "npm run serve -s" "npm run watch -s"
scripts.-postversion: git push && git push --tags && rm -rf build/temp
scripts.cov: npm run cov:clean && npm run cov:generate
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.validate-dev: npm run lint && npm run build && npm test | faucet
scripts.deps: npm run deps:missing && npm run deps:extra
scripts.deps:extra: dependency-check package.json --extra --no-dev --ignore -i jade -i mithril -i mongoose -i redis
scripts.check: npm run audit && npm run deps && npm outdated --depth 0
